cannon_bully.name: cannon_bully
cannon_bully.effect_text:
surprise! can free play, even on your opponent’s turn (as long as its ship is not empty). is destroyed at the  end of the player turn.

*only 3 surprise! cards allowed per poop deck.

fiend-o-war.name: fiend-o-war
fiend-o-war.effect_text: while at sea at the start of each of your turns, this card returns to your hand.

harbinger_of_pyrocy.name: harbinger_of_pyrocy
harbinger_of_pyrocy.effect_text: when played look at the bottom card of your poop deck. if it’s a shanty, this card is immediately destroyed (then shuffle poop deck).

feral_sword_beast.name: feral_sword_beast
feral_sword_beast.effect_text:
none




*for all game purposes this card counts as “sword beast” 007.

pyrannosaurus_rex.name: pyrannosaurus_rex
pyrannosaurus_rex.effect_text: when played if this is the card to complete a crew, you may send two volleys, instead of one (if able).

broadsidosaurus.name: broadsidosaurus
broadsidosaurus.effect_text: when played if this is the first card on the ship, when its crew is completed, instead of sinking a ship, destroy all of your opponent’s pirates at sea.

boom_sacrifice.name: boom_sacrifice
boom_sacrifice.effect_text: when destroyed pick one of your opponent’s pirates at sea to destroy as well.

fleet_phoenix.name: fleet_phoenix
fleet_phoenix.effect_text: when destroyed, return to your hand. the next time you play a “fleet phoenix” it has an additional, permanent x2.

lava_landlubber.name: lava_landlubber
lava_landlubber.effect_text: when played select one ship at sea (friendly or not) and flip it face down. its pirate code and effect are null. for all purposes it’s a normal boom ship.

the_ship-rex.name: the_ship-rex
the_ship-rex.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are boom, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

kannon_katcher.name: kannon_katcher
kannon_katcher.effect_text: while at sea when your opponent sends a volley, you may destroy this pirate instead of the intended target.

shogun_scourge.name: shogun_scourge
shogun_scourge.effect_text: while at sea when your opponent declares they are running the blockade, you may free play a card from your hand.

seaworthy_sovereign_.name: seaworthy_sovereign_
seaworthy_sovereign_.effect_text: boarding restriction: you must return to your hand all pirates (at least one needs to be present) from the ship this is boarding (this card may board a ship with a complete crew). this pirate gets a permanent +2 for each returned pirate.

popcolonels.name: popcolonels
popcolonels.effect_text: while at sea the ship this card is on requires one fewer pirate to complete a crew.

long-neck_destroyer.name: long-neck_destroyer
long-neck_destroyer.effect_text: your opponent gets -4 when attempting to run your blockade.

gunpowder_sage:_blast_mode.name: gunpowder_sage:_blast_mode
gunpowder_sage:_blast_mode.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 3 orders. however, if you have a friendly “gunpowder sage” at sea, you may shuffle it back into your poop deck  and board this in its place without costing an order.

gladiator_gold.name: gladiator_gold
gladiator_gold.effect_text: when played set this pirate’s firepower to exactly one below the number you need to become equal to your opponent’s firepower.

briney_deep,_prehistoric_privateer.name: briney_deep,_prehistoric_privateer
briney_deep,_prehistoric_privateer.effect_text: when played and at the start each subsequent turn, if the ship this pirate is on has the most firepower of any ship at sea (friendly or not), gain a bonus order.

powder_king.name: powder_king
powder_king.effect_text: when this pirate is in davy jones’ locker, the next time a boom pirate is played (friendly or not), pick one of your opponent’s ships to sink. then remove this card from the game.

avast_avenger!.name: avast_avenger!
avast_avenger!.effect_text: while at sea if this is the pirate to complete a crew, you may choose not to send a volley. then, at a later point, you may destroy this card in order to send the volley.

extinction_tooth.name: extinction_tooth
extinction_tooth.effect_text: when destroyed get one fewer order on your following turn (including runs of the blockade).

nuclear_nautilus.name: nuclear_nautilus
nuclear_nautilus.effect_text:
boarding restriction can only be played by directly spending an order.
while at sea
at the start of each of your turns, send the top two ships from your dock deck to your ship graveyard. then get a free run of the blockade.

the_legendary_flamighydra.name: the_legendary_flamighydra
the_legendary_flamighydra.effect_text: while at sea this card gets +5 for every ship in your ship graveyard.

scarpion_treasure_bug.name: scarpion_treasure_bug
scarpion_treasure_bug.effect_text: when this card is drawn from the top of your deck, you may free play it, if able.

sailor_boom.name: sailor_boom
sailor_boom.effect_text: while at sea your opponent may not play any pirates except through a standard use of orders (no use of effects).

pterror_pteam.name: pterror_pteam
pterror_pteam.effect_text: while at sea  you may spend two orders and immediately destroy a pirate at sea (friendly or not).

wave_in_a_bottle.name: wave_in_a_bottle
wave_in_a_bottle.effect_text: when played exhaust one of your opponent’s ships.

cannon_floof.name: cannon_floof
cannon_floof.effect_text: when played take the top card of your poop deck and immediately free play it (you cannot play another pirate via card effect for the rest of the player turn).

topgallant_knight.name: topgallant_knight
topgallant_knight.effect_text: while at sea all pirates on the ship this pirate is on cannot be destroyed, moved or returned to your hand directly by card effects.

navigator_nuts.name: navigator_nuts
navigator_nuts.effect_text: when played you may immediately swap one ship at sea with a ship from your dock deck (replacing all pirates and shanties on the new ship).

headwind_hero_of_land-ho.name: headwind_hero_of_land-ho
headwind_hero_of_land-ho.effect_text: while at sea this card counts as if all “equip to pirate” shanties at sea and in your davy jones locker have been played on it.

mooring_monk.name: mooring_monk
mooring_monk.effect_text: when played you may immediately board a pirate with no effect from your davy jones’ locker.

army_guy.name: army_guy
army_guy.effect_text: this card cannot be played on a ship with a pirate with no effect. it gets an additional +3 for every pirate at sea with no effect (friendly or not).

defensible_dreamer.name: defensible_dreamer
defensible_dreamer.effect_text: if this card is the only pirate aboard a ship, that ship cannot be sunk.

chop_chop.name: chop_chop
chop_chop.effect_text: the turn after this card is played, you get a free run of the blockade before you start your official turn.

bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane.name: bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane
bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane.effect_text: when played you may either bring an “equip to” shanty from your poop deck to your hand or you may free play one from your hand.

peglegasus.name: peglegasus
peglegasus.effect_text: when played on the following turn, your opponent can’t run the blockade.

the_icemoor.name: the_icemoor
the_icemoor.effect_text: while at sea your opponent additionally needs more pirates than you to run the blockade.

reef_ronin.name: reef_ronin
reef_ronin.effect_text: when played pick a pirate at sea (friendly or not) and send them back to their owner’s hand.

shrimpviathen_(aka_jumbo_shrimp).name: shrimpviathen_(aka_jumbo_shrimp)
shrimpviathen_(aka_jumbo_shrimp).effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are deep sea, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

brain_coral.name: brain_coral
brain_coral.effect_text: when this card is played, pick a card at random from your opponent’s hand and add it to yours.

kah_mune_deer.name: kah_mune_deer
kah_mune_deer.effect_text:
surprise! you may free play this card and prevent your opponent from setting sail a ship until their following turn. if there is nowhere to play, this card is instead destroyed.

*only 3 surprise! cards allowed per poop deck.

anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades.name: anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades
anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades.effect_text: while at sea at the start of your turn, you may choose to give up your free draw in exchange for an extra order.

harbor_harpy.name: harbor_harpy
harbor_harpy.effect_text: when played if your opponent has double, or more, pirates at sea than you, bring one of your opponent’s pirates over to the ship this pirate is on, if able.

brute.name: brute
brute.effect_text: when played, choose two pirates from each of your opponent’s ships with a complete crew and destroy them.

harbor_colossus.name: harbor_colossus
harbor_colossus.effect_text: boarding restriction: take any number of cards from the top of your dock deck (at least one) and place them under this pirate. if this pirate is destroyed by any means except a successful run of the blockade, all ships attached are sent to your ship graveyard. otherwise, shuffle them back into your dock deck. this card gets +10 for every attached ship.

ah_hazzah!.name: ah_hazzah!
ah_hazzah!.effect_text: when played none of your ships can be sunk from a volley on your opponent’s next turn.

the_cute_one.name: the_cute_one
the_cute_one.effect_text: when played, perform rocks-paper-scissors with your opponent. if you win this card is a +10.

pony_boy.name: pony_boy
pony_boy.effect_text: when the ship this pirate is on sinks, you may move this card to a friendly ship with available space.

lucky_clam.name: lucky_clam
lucky_clam.effect_text: while at sea if you have at least one friendly “lucky clam” then, when your opponent announces they are running the blockade, get a bonus order on your following turn.

piranknot.name: piranknot
piranknot.effect_text: when played pick one pirate at sea (friendly or not) to destroy. at the end of the player turn, shuffle this card back into your poop deck, draw a new one.

abyss_battalion.name: abyss_battalion
abyss_battalion.effect_text: when played: the game turn after this, running the blockade costs you 2 orders.

jay_sparrows.name: jay_sparrows
jay_sparrows.effect_text: after drawing your opening hand at the start of the game, bring this card to your hand. after any successful runs of the blockade, bring this card to your hand, from anywhere.

captain_harpoon.name: captain_harpoon
captain_harpoon.effect_text: when this card is played, pick another ship at sea. that ship and the ship this card is on are now linked. when one primes, the other does as well.

tentacollector.name: tentacollector
tentacollector.effect_text: when played you may move one pirate (friendly or not) to another ship on their side.

cycloptus.name: cycloptus
cycloptus.effect_text: while at sea any pirate that shares a ship with this card is destroyed.

captain_lazerbeard.name: captain_lazerbeard
captain_lazerbeard.effect_text: while at sea this card’s firepower is multiplied by the number of heavy metal pirates in both player’s davy jones’ lockers. when destroyed, remove from the game.

caskmaster.name: caskmaster
caskmaster.effect_text: you may play this card as if it was a hidden shanty. upon revealing it, immediately board it on a friendly ship with space (any card that targets this card to destroy a shanty, is ignored and returned to the owner’s hand as if an order had not been spent).

bionic_blowfish_blader.name: bionic_blowfish_blader
bionic_blowfish_blader.effect_text: when played you may choose to destroy another friendly pirate at sea. if you do, this pirate gains a permanent +6.

miss-isles.name: miss-isles
miss-isles.effect_text: when played if this card is on an exhausted ship, destroy one of your opponent’s pirates.

metal_devil.name: metal_devil
metal_devil.effect_text: while at sea any points that are being subtracted from your opponent get x3.

anchross_aweigh.name: anchross_aweigh
anchross_aweigh.effect_text: while at sea the pirates on the ship opposite this one are all brought back to their base firepower (+x count as +0 in this case).

flintlock_fury.name: flintlock_fury
flintlock_fury.effect_text: when played if your opponent has more pirates at sea than you, you may destroy one enemy pirate.

mobile_sailor_gundeck.name: mobile_sailor_gundeck
mobile_sailor_gundeck.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are heavy metal, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

gunpowder_sage:_hyper_mode.name: gunpowder_sage:_hyper_mode
gunpowder_sage:_hyper_mode.effect_text: when playing this card, you must first discard a “gunpowder sage” from your hand. the total firepower of the ship this card is on also gets subtracted from your opponent’s total firepower.

lobster_tank_blue.name: lobster_tank_blue
lobster_tank_blue.effect_text:
none




*for all game purposes this card counts as “lobster tank” 030.

hermit_crawlers.name: hermit_crawlers
hermit_crawlers.effect_text: while at sea the ship this pirate is on cannot send a volley and requires two orders to board a pirate on that ship. this card may board your opponent’s ships.

lightning_eels.name: lightning_eels
lightning_eels.effect_text: when played destroy all of your opponent’s hidden shanties at sea.

angler-bot_of_the_chaos_urchin_order.name: angler-bot_of_the_chaos_urchin_order
angler-bot_of_the_chaos_urchin_order.effect_text: when played search your opponent’s poop deck and remove all copies of one of their cards from the game. they do the same with your poop deck.

apoc.ko1.lypse.name: apoc.ko1.lypse
apoc.ko1.lypse.effect_text: boarding restriction: your opponent gets a bonus order on their following turn.

other_spaceman.name: other_spaceman
other_spaceman.effect_text: when destroyed you may exhaust one of your ships to immediately play this card again.

calculegend.name: calculegend
calculegend.effect_text: boarding restriction: you may only board this pirate on a ship if the cumulative points on that ship will be a prime number (once played).

third_spaceman.name: third_spaceman
third_spaceman.effect_text: while at sea you may once, without costing an order, move this card to another ship. then flip this card face down. until destroyed, it counts as a +0 no-pirate code pirate with no effect.

metal_muncher.name: metal_muncher
metal_muncher.effect_text: when played you may free play any number of “equip to” shanties from your davy jones’ locker.

lord_voyager.name: lord_voyager
lord_voyager.effect_text: when played each player picks one of their opponent’s ships to sink (if able). then for each player who had a ship sunk, they return one ship from their ship graveyard to their dock deck.

slot_machine.name: slot_machine
slot_machine.effect_text: when played flip each of the three pieces of booty. if you get no heads, this card is destroyed. one heads, this card gets +5. two heads draw a card. three heads, you may free play a card from your hand.

quartermaster_95.name: quartermaster_95
quartermaster_95.effect_text: while at sea your opponent can only board pirates (while directly using orders) onto their ship(s) currently with the fewest pirates.

subject:_s3a_zku11.name: subject:_s3a_zku11
subject:_s3a_zku11.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 3 orders. you may discard any number of pirates  from your hand when played. for each card discarded, gain one additional order.

sailor_spaceman_.name: sailor_spaceman_
sailor_spaceman_.effect_text: when played immediately remove this card from the game. at the start of any of your future turns, you may free play it on one of your ships.

the_deckrunner.name: the_deckrunner
the_deckrunner.effect_text: when played you may free play another pirate from your hand with firepower less than this card. the effect of the free played card is ignored and for all purposes it’s a no effect card.

metal_dino.name: metal_dino
metal_dino.effect_text: when played if this is the pirate to complete a crew, search your opponent’s dock deck and send one of their ships to their ship graveyard.

world-ender.name: world-ender
world-ender.effect_text: when played for the remainder of this turn, you may play cards directly from your davy jones’ locker.

shipside_shelling_corp..name: shipside_shelling_corp.
shipside_shelling_corp..effect_text: while at sea when any ship is exhausted (friendly or not), you may pick a pirate on the ship opposite this one to destroy.

drone.name: drone
drone.effect_text: while at sea if you start your turn without a hidden shanty or “equip to” shanty attached to this card, it’s destroyed.

fate_crew.name: fate_crew
fate_crew.effect_text: when played shuffle your opponent’s djl and take the top card, bringing it to your hand.

schoonier.name: schoonier
schoonier.effect_text: while at sea at the start of each of your turns, return this card to your hand. if done so, you may free play this card that turn.

super_destroy.name: super_destroy
super_destroy.effect_text: while at sea any effects (yours or your opponent’s) that would destroy a pirate, instead remove it from the game.

scallywag_cyber.name: scallywag_cyber
scallywag_cyber.effect_text: when played you may swap one friendly pirate or shanty currently at sea with one of the cards in your hand (activate boarding effects).

scallywag_cyber_2.0.name: scallywag_cyber_2.0
scallywag_cyber_2.0.effect_text: while at sea if this is the first card on the ship it boards, your opponent cannot activate “when played” effects (as long as this is at sea).

pocket_pirate.name: pocket_pirate
pocket_pirate.effect_text: while at sea for every friendly “pocket pirate” at sea, this card gets x3.

coconaut.name: coconaut
coconaut.effect_text: when played (with an order), search your poop deck for another “coconaut” card. it may immediately board this ship without costing an order (space allowing).

kickus_cactus.name: kickus_cactus
kickus_cactus.effect_text: if this card is drawn from the top of your poop deck, immediately shuffle it back in and draw a new card.

the_vacation_demon.name: the_vacation_demon
the_vacation_demon.effect_text: when played both players shuffle their hands back into their poop decks and draw that many cards.

barfrogamew_hops.name: barfrogamew_hops
barfrogamew_hops.effect_text: while at sea any time you discard a card from your hand, you may free play one first before discarding down.

monarch_matey.name: monarch_matey
monarch_matey.effect_text: on your turn, if this pirate would complete a crew when played, you may free play it to complete the crew.

age_of_aged_cheese.name: age_of_aged_cheese
age_of_aged_cheese.effect_text: when this card enters your hand, reveal it. at the start of each of your turns that this card remains in your hand, place a marker on it. when this card boards a ship, it gets +5 for each marker.

ants_of_the_pirate_queen\u2019s_army.name: ants_of_the_pirate_queen’s_army
ants_of_the_pirate_queen\u2019s_army.effect_text: while this card is at sea, get +1 for every empty spot on your ships.

unkillable_kiwi_krew.name: unkillable_kiwi_krew
unkillable_kiwi_krew.effect_text: while in your davy jones’ locker, if you retrieve any card from your djl, you may also free play this card.

hercules_hull_beetle.name: hercules_hull_beetle
hercules_hull_beetle.effect_text: while at sea each time you access your poop deck (for anything besides drawing a card) give one friendly pirate a permanent +2.

shiver_me_timberers.name: shiver_me_timberers
shiver_me_timberers.effect_text: when played discard a card from your hand.

kommodore_kong.name: kommodore_kong
kommodore_kong.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are tropical, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

platypirate.name: platypirate
platypirate.effect_text: when played if this is the first pirate on the ship it boards, you may immediately board another pirate to that ship, without costing an order.

toucan_trader.name: toucan_trader
toucan_trader.effect_text: when played you may either immediately draw two cards or search your poop deck for a pirate and bring it to your hand.

camouflage_bug.name: camouflage_bug
camouflage_bug.effect_text: you may play this card as if it was a hidden shanty. upon revealing it, immediately board it on a friendly ship with space.

cutlass_cricket.name: cutlass_cricket
cutlass_cricket.effect_text: while at sea all pirates that share a ship with this card get +5.

treasuratops.name: treasuratops
treasuratops.effect_text: when played draw a card and draw 1 additional card at the start of each of your turns.

ba_ba_buccaneer.name: ba_ba_buccaneer
ba_ba_buccaneer.effect_text: when played you may either search your poop deck for a “sword” pirate and bring it to your hand or give one friendly pirate who is not a “sword” +3.

terror_of_the_seas_tater.name: terror_of_the_seas_tater
terror_of_the_seas_tater.effect_text: while at sea, pick a type (plant, robot, animal, etc.), any time your opponent plays a card of that type, you may also free play a card from your hand (only once a turn).

sea-loth.name: sea-loth
sea-loth.effect_text: while at sea if this is the card to complete a crew, your opponent no longer gets a free draw at the start of their turn until this card is destroyed.

master_sheepwright.name: master_sheepwright
master_sheepwright.effect_text: while at sea count the effect of the ship it’s on as if there’s a second copy of the ship’s effect (as if it just set sail).

horizon_herd.name: horizon_herd
horizon_herd.effect_text: when played you may immediately free play any other “horizon herd” cards in your hand.

the_drowned_king.name: the_drowned_king
the_drowned_king.effect_text: this pirate can only board a ship if you have 15 or more cards between both davy jones’ lockers. if there are 15 or more, you may use two orders to bring this card from your poop deck to immediately board a ship. when destroyed, this card is removed from the game.

the_seacophagus.name: the_seacophagus
the_seacophagus.effect_text: while at sea any time a pirate is destroyed, instead of going to djl, it gets placed under this pirate. this pirate gets the cumulative firepower of all attached pirates. when this card is destroyed, return all attached pirates to their respective djls.

hangkor,_lord_of_gallows.name: hangkor,_lord_of_gallows
hangkor,_lord_of_gallows.effect_text: boarding restriction: can only be played if there’s only one booty left. this card’s firepower is equal to +99. when destroyed, is instead removed from the game and all friendly pirates at sea are destroyed too.

madame_crossed_bones.name: madame_crossed_bones
madame_crossed_bones.effect_text: while at sea once per game turn, if one or more of your pirates (besides this card) is destroyed, gain an extra order on your following turn.

cannon_boo.name: cannon_boo
cannon_boo.effect_text:
surprise! you may free play this card when your opponent is sending a volley. prevent a ship from sinking. if played this way, this card is a +4.

*only 3 surprise! cards allowed per poop deck.

jack-o-loot.name: jack-o-loot
jack-o-loot.effect_text: while at sea when you or your opponent reveals a hidden shanty, you may flip this card face down (at which point it counts as a no effect +0 juju pirate).  then it counts as if you immediately played a second copy of that shanty.

mutiny_mummy.name: mutiny_mummy
mutiny_mummy.effect_text: when this card first boards a ship, pick one of your opponent’s ships. as long as this card is at sea, the cumulative points of this ship and your selected opponent’s ship now have their points inverted.

zombuoy.name: zombuoy
zombuoy.effect_text: when destroyed, during your next turn, board this pirate on a friendly ship.

flotsamstein.name: flotsamstein
flotsamstein.effect_text: when played, you may send up to two pirates from your poop deck to your davy jones’ locker. this card’s points equal the total of those two.

the_plankwalker.name: the_plankwalker
the_plankwalker.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are juju, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.

the_seastress.name: the_seastress
the_seastress.effect_text: when played pick one pirate at sea (friendly or not). that pirate permanently loses their effect and this card gains it (activate this effect as if this was just played).

gunpowder_sage:_ash_mode.name: gunpowder_sage:_ash_mode
gunpowder_sage:_ash_mode.effect_text: boarding restriction: must have a friendly “gunpowder sage” at sea. without costing an order, destroy it to board this card. starting the turn this card is played, you may board one “explosive” or “not dead”pirate from your djl each game turn without costing an order.

vampire.name: vampire
vampire.effect_text: while at sea play with the top card of your poop deck face up. as long as the top card of your poop deck is a pirate, this card gets +8.

tidal_troublemaker.name: tidal_troublemaker
tidal_troublemaker.effect_text: when this card is played, you may discard a shanty and bring two from your davy jones’ locker to your hand.

moth_from_the_unknown_sea.name: moth_from_the_unknown_sea
moth_from_the_unknown_sea.effect_text: while at sea any time you end your turn without any cards in your hand, you may immediately board three pirates from your davy jones’ locker to a friendly ship(s). no additional pirates can be boarded through card effect for the rest of the player turn. flip this card face down once activated.

arg_angel.name: arg_angel
arg_angel.effect_text: when played if you have more pirates than shanties in your davy jones locker, draw a card. if you have more shanties than pirates in your davy jones locker, you may free play a card.

weredolphin.name: weredolphin
weredolphin.effect_text: when played if this was played in any way besides a direct order, it gains +11.

bootstrap_berserker.name: bootstrap_berserker
bootstrap_berserker.effect_text: while at sea when this card has a hidden shanty or “equip” card attached to it, it gets x2.

ye_olde_ferry_fox.name: ye_olde_ferry_fox
ye_olde_ferry_fox.effect_text: when one of your pirates is destroyed, you may bring it to your hand and immediately board this card onto a friendly ship.

ye_olde_ferry_fox_kitsune.name: ye_olde_ferry_fox_kitsune
ye_olde_ferry_fox_kitsune.effect_text:
when one of your pirates is destroyed, you may bring it to your hand and immediately board this card onto a friendly ship.

*for all game purposes this card counts as “ye olde ferry fox” 124.

davy_jones\u2019_abomination.name: davy_jones’_abomination
davy_jones\u2019_abomination.effect_text: when played add up the amount of cards in both davy jones’ lockers. that is the point value of this card going forward (does not change). when destroyed, remove from game.

the_greater_sand_witch.name: the_greater_sand_witch
the_greater_sand_witch.effect_text: while at sea this pirate gets +2 for every shanty in your davy jones’ locker.

mr._manty_and_his_magical_hat.name: mr._manty_and_his_magical_hat
mr._manty_and_his_magical_hat.effect_text: when played you may free play a hidden shanty.

shipwreck_golem.name: shipwreck_golem
shipwreck_golem.effect_text: when this card is played, you must choose one friendly ship to sink.

doctor_croctor.name: doctor_croctor
doctor_croctor.effect_text: when played return one card from your davy jones’ locker to your hand.

spectral_dutchman.name: spectral_dutchman
spectral_dutchman.effect_text: this card starts the game in your davy jones’ locker.

doombeard.name: doombeard
doombeard.effect_text: This card can only be played on “The Doomtreader” with “Remnants of Piracy’s First Age” equipped. While this card is at Sea, your opponent cannot successfully Run the Blockade. When you successfully  Run the Blockade you immediately win the game. Only one “Doombeard” allowed in a deck.
